Bard: A Tactical Retreat
Skald: A Tactical Retreat
Our henchmen have brought back a troop of slaves liberated from a local farming village. Thralls for our King!
Our henchmen have robbed several merchant caravans. Warfare can be a profitable affair.
Our henchmen have rustled cattle from the herds of our rivals.
Our henchmen found a monastery belonging to our enemies and robbed it of all its wealth.
Our Captains have cut a deal with a renowned Viking captain. For a share of our Plunder, and a really big hat, he'll sail his ships under your command.
Our Captains have found an abundance of suitable crew to man their voyages. These talented sailors await your command to sail for glory and plunder!
Our Captains have recruited the services of a large number of Vikings willing to sail with our raiding fleets. These talented killers await your command to sail for glory and plunder!
The daring feats of our heroes on the field of battle bring honour and glory to our Kingdom!
Tales of our courage and strength are told throughout the realm by our Bards.
Tales of our stoic determination and patriotic zeal are told throughout the realm by our Bards.
Tales of our Heroic acts are told throughout the realm by our Bards.
Our bards travel far and wide with songs of our Kingdom's glory.
Our scribes have authored accounts of our Kingdom that are read across the continent.
Our scribes have authored an account of our governance, demonstrating our just rule.
Our scribes have authored an epic work commemorating our great deeds.
Our scribes have authored an exceptional legend of our Family's ancient Kingship.
Our scribes have authored an account of our conquests. It has sold suprisingly well.
Our Skald has inspired increased fealty from our subjects through his tales of your Glory.
Our Skald has inspired increased fealty from our subjects through his tales of your Glory.
Our skald has inspired our people's awe with tales of our discoveries.
Our Skald has inspired the people's fury, preparing them for war.

The enemy with swords drawn and banners unfurled are certainly impressive. It definitely wasn't sheer terror that caused your general to swing his troops about in the opposite direction. Of course not! It was just that he knew that this was not the correct time to fight. It would be far more elegant for the enemy to tire themselves out in pursuit... less wasteful of your mens' lives too. He'd be sure to relay this plan to his captains as soon as he finished his morning jog.

The enemy with swords drawn and banners unfurled are certainly impressive. It definitely wasn't sheer terror that caused your general to swing his troops about in the opposite direction. Of course not! It was just that he knew that this was not the correct time to fight. It would be far more elegant for the enemy to tire themselves out in pursuit... less wasteful of your mens' lives too. He'd be sure to relay this plan to his captains as soon as he finished his morning jog.
Swiftly taking to his feet\\nHe beat a very brave retreat\\nBravest of the brave, Sir Robin!\\n
Drills: Selection
Drills: Men for the Marches

While our army encamps, our Select Fyrd Captain drills the recruits. From their number, he has selected young men with acceptable martial talents and exceptional resolve to serve in the king's Select Fyrd.

While our army encamps, our Marcher Veteran drills the recruits. From their number, he has weeded out the weak and the cowardly, and recommends several dozen men to serve as future defenders of our Kingdom's borders.
